careers.title: Software Engineer
careers.description: Join our dynamic team to develop cutting-edge software solutions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in Java, Python, or C++

careers.title: Data Scientist
careers.description: Analyze complex data to drive strategic business decisions.

careers.title: UI/UX Designer
careers.description: Create user-centered designs that enhance user experiences.
requirements: Proficient in design tools like Figma or Adobe XD
Strong understanding of user experience principles
